com.emitrom.flash4j.starling.client.utils

Class Color

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.emitrom.flash4j.starling.client.utils.Color

  • public class Color
extends java.lang.Object
    A utility class containing predefined colors and methods converting between different color representations.
